Description.Text:
The Gibside Hotel is just 5 minutes from the A1M, situated in the centre of Whickham village, and an ideal location for business or pleasure. The village includes a beautiful park, selection of shops, individual restaurants, and local pubs, all within easy walking distance.

The hotel overlooks the Metrocentre, the largest indoor shopping and leisure complex in Europe, with easy access to Newcastle city centre, and the Quayside, the hub of Newcastle Nightlife. Gateshead, Durham and the regions main commercial centres are all within easy travelling distance, and the hotel is surrounded by some of the North Easts finest heritage .

Free Wi-Fi internet access is available in the hotel , and the hotel has extensive car parking available at the rear of the hotel.

The Gibside Hotel is situated in the center of historic Whickham village, yet closely situated to central Newcastle and the main business centers. It has a good location for both business travellers and guests on vacation. You can visit the Metro Centre, one of Europe's largest shopping malls, and you will be a short drive from The Quayside, the hub of Newcastle's nightlife.

Standard - Single - Standard Single offers one double bed. Twin/ Double for single occupancy - All of the bedrooms offer a comfortable relaxing atmosphere, and are fully equipped with direct dial telephone, radio, alarm, colour television with free view chanels and remote control, trouser press, hairdrier, and tea/coffee hospitality tray

All rooms are en suite, with bath, shower, WC. Deluxe - Single - Deluxe Single offers one king bed. The new Deluxe rooms have king-sized beds ,flat screen TV's with remote control and freeview channels, radio, alarm, hairdrier ,tea/ coffee hospitality tray , and designer toiletries. All rooms are non smoking . Junior - Suite - Junior Suite offers one king bed. Large room with kingsized bed and seperate sitting area with two settees . Full equipped bathroom with designer toiletries .Flat screen TV with remote control, satellite channels . Free wi-fi internet access . Standard - Double - Standard Double offers one double bed. All of the bedrooms offer a comfortable relaxing atmosphere, and are fully equipped with direct dial telephone, radio, alarm, colour television with free view chanels and remote control, trouser press, hairdrier, and tea/coffee hospitality tray Standard - Twin - Standard Twin offers two twin beds. All of the bedrooms offer a comfortable relaxing atmosphere, and are fully equipped with direct dial telephone, radio, alarm, colour television with free view chanels and remote control, trouser press, hairdrier, and tea/coffee hospitality tray Deluxe - Double - Deluxe Double offers king bed. Newly refurbished Delux Double room. King sized bed, flat screen colour Tv with remote control and Freeview channels , radio, alarm, direct dial telephone, hairdrier tea/ coffee hospitality tray , free wi fi internet access .
Designer toiletries . Deluxe - Twin - Deluxe Twin offers two twin beds. Newly refurbished Deluxe Twin room with 2 x 3ft beds. Flat screen colour TV with remote control and Freeview channels , radio, alarm, direct dial telephone, hairdrier ,tea/ coffee making facilities , free wi fi .
Designer toiletries in bathroom . Junior - Suite - Junior Suite offers one king bed. Large room with king sized bed and separate sitting area with two settees . Two flat screen colour TV's with remote control . Fully equipped bathroom, bath, shower WC , and additional double shower room . Free wi fi internet access
